short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes the background dark and changes the leading color

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple yet powerful extension for Google Translate, designed for those who work long hours and need seamless translation support. Now, with a brand-new feature, you can instantly open Google Translate from any website by selecting the text you want to translateâ€”no more copying and pasting!

Compatible with all Google domains, not just '.com'. You can also customize the leading color through the extension's popup to match your preferences.

The extension is completely free and does not alter any Chrome settings.

If you find using this extension useful, please consider leaving some stars.
